author: Gabriel Friedman
title: ‘Longer U-shaped recovery’: Economists say Canada could face deeper downturn, slower rebound than U.S. because of high household debt and oil dependency
description: Return to pre-coronavirus GDP levels not likely until at best 2021, but more likely 2022
content:
While health authorities in British Columbia and Ontario say coronavirus cases might be peaking, some economists expect Canada’s economic rebound to be more protracted than anticipated.
Two reports released on Monday, from TD Bank and from the audit and tax … [+3957 chars]
